channel.title: I cant connect to my server
channel.description: So here's the situation: My brother and I have a server which is on our network drive, if he is running the actual server on his computer i cant connect ive tried his local ip (as our external ip is the same because were on a router) which is static. Any ideas?

item.title: I cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @andr3wrulz andr3wrulz
item.description:
@andr3wrulz wrote:

ive tried that is takes a long time saying “connecting to server” then says “error connecting to server”

Read full topic
item.source: I cant connect to my server

item.title: I cant connect to my server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Connect to the server using his IPv4 address.

Read full topic
